critique: The document expresses concern and determination to address a serious situation in Cote d'Ivoire. It conveys a sense of urgency and resolve through the declaration of a national emergency and the imposition of sanctions. The initial scores reflect these emotions, with sadness and fear related to the humanitarian crisis, and a touch of anger and surprise at the situation escalating to this point. The revised scores fine-tune these emotions based on a closer reading, emphasizing the seriousness and urgency of the matter.
